attributes.action: make the inquiry into the iraq war public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We urge you to change your decision to hold the inquiry into the reasons for the iraq war and the subsequent conflict behind closed doors. This must be held in public otherwise it will simply feed the current climate of "suspicion and scepticism" about this government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
